name: add_new_coded_template
description: Create a new coded template object in Design Manager.

template_html_source.description: The source code of the template.

custom_creation_timestamp.description: The creation date in milliseconds since epoch. Defaults to current time.

design_template_kind.description:
The type of template to create. Defaults to 2 (Email template).
Valid values:
- 2: Email template
- 4: Page template
- 11: Error template
- 12: Subscription preferences template
- 13: Backup unsubscribe page template
- 14: Subscriptions update confirmation template
- 19: Password prompt page template
- 27: Search results template
- 29: Membership login template
- 30: Membership registration template
- 31: Membership reset password confirmation template
- 32: Membership reset password request template

template_content_category.description:
The category type. Defaults to 2 (Email).
Valid values:
- 0: Unmapped
- 1: Landing Pages
- 2: Email
- 3: Blog Post
- 4: Site Page

destination_storage_folder.description: The folder to save the template. Defaults to '/templates/'.

new_template_file_path.description: The path to save the template. Defaults to '/home/templates/'.

mark_as_available_for_new_content.description: Whether the template should be available for new content. Defaults to False.

name: archive_web_form
description: Archive a form

form_identifier_to_archive.description: The id of the form to archive.

name: build_new_web_form
description: Create a new Marketing Form.

submission_button_label.description: The submit text of the form.

groupType.description: The type of the field group.

richTextType.description: The type of rich text included. The default value is text.

richText.description: A block of rich text or an image. Those can be used to add extra information for the customers filling in the form. If the field group includes fields, the rich text will be displayed before the fields.

fieldType.description: The type of the field. Can be one of: email, phone, mobile_phone, single_line_text, multi_line_text, number, single_checkbox, multiple_checkboxes, dropdown, radio, datepicker, file, payment_link_radio

placeholder.description: The placeholder text of the field.

defaultValue.description: The default value of the field.

fields.description: The fields of the field group.

form_field_group_configuration.description: The field groups of the form.

label.description: The main label for the form field
The main label for the form field

lawfulBasis.description: The lawful basis for the consent

type.description: The type of the legitimate interest

privacyText.description: The privacy text of the legitimate interest

gdpr_consent_settings.description: The legal consent options of the form. Default is None.

name: compose_new_promotional_email
description: Creates a new marketing email.

internal_email_title.description: The internal name of the email (required).

email_recipient_subject_line.description: The email subject line. Default is None.

email_body_html_content.description: The HTML body of the email. Default is None.

mark_as_transactional_email.description: Whether this is a transactional email. Default is False.

initial_email_sending_status.description: The status of the email (e.g. 'scheduled', 'sent'). Default is None.

promotional_discount_code.description: Discount code for promotional emails. Default is None.

offer_validity_date.description: Expiration date for time-limited offers. Default is None.

product_announcement_date.description: Launch date for product announcements. Default is None.

special_offer_end_date.description: End date for sales promotions. Default is None.

customer_loyalty_points.description: Number of reward points for loyalty program emails. Default is None.

exclusive_offer_access_code.description: Access code for VIP or exclusive offers. Default is None.

name: dispatch_adhoc_transactional_email
description: Sends a single transactional email.

email_content_and_recipient_info.description: An object containing email content and recipient info.

email_custom_metadata.description:
Custom properties for the email.
Can include any key-value pairs for email personalization.

name: dispatch_templated_transactional_email
description: Sends a single transactional email based on a pre-existing email template.

email_template_id_to_use.description: The ID of the pre-existing transactional email template to send.

email.description: Required. Email address of the recipient.
Required. Email address of the CC recipient.
Required. Email address of the BCC recipient.
Required. Email address of the sender.

email_composition_details.description: An object containing email content and recipient info.

template_personalization_data.description: Custom property values for template personalization.

name: duplicate_promotional_email
description: Clones an existing marketing email.

source_email_identifier.description: The ID of the marketing email to clone (required).

new_cloned_email_internal_name.description: The name for the new, cloned email (required).

name: edit_existing_form
description: Update a Marketing Form.

form_id_for_modification.description: The id of the form to update.

updated_form_name.description: The new name of the form.

new_submit_button_text.description: The new submit text of the form.

groupType.description: The type of the field group.

richTextType.description: The type of rich text included. The default value is text.

richText.description: A block of rich text or an image. Those can be used to add extra information for the customers filling in the form. If the field group includes fields, the rich text will be displayed before the fields.

fieldType.description: The type of the field. Can be one of: email, phone, mobile_phone, single_line_text, multi_line_text, number, single_checkbox, multiple_checkboxes, dropdown, radio, datepicker, file, payment_link_radio

placeholder.description: The placeholder text of the field.

defaultValue.description: The default value of the field.

fields.description: The fields of the field group.

revised_field_groups.description: The new field groups of the form.

label.description: The main label for the form field
The main label for the form field

lawfulBasis.description: The lawful basis for the consent

type.description: The type of the legitimate interest

privacyText.description: The privacy text of the legitimate interest

modified_legal_consent_options.description: The new legal consent options of the form. Default is None.

name: erase_promotional_email
description: Deletes a marketing email.

email_identifier_to_delete.description: The unique ID of the marketing email to delete (required).

name: establish_global_form_event_webhook
description: Creates a new webhook subscription for global form events.

webhook_callback_url.description: The endpoint of the subscription definition.

subscribed.description: Whether the contact is subscribed to the subscription.

opt_in_date.description: The date the contact opted in to the subscription.

webhook_event_parameters.description: The subscription details of the subscription definition.

name: fetch_campaign_details_by_id
description: Gets a single campaign by its ID.

name: fetch_marketing_event_by_external_id
description: Get a marketing event by its external ID.

external_event_identifier.description: The unique identifier for the marketing event as per the external system where the event was created.

external_account_identifier.description: The unique identifier for the account where the event was created.

name: fetch_template_by_identifier
description: Get a specific template by ID.

specific_template_id.description: The unique identifier of the template.

name: find_form_by_identifier
description: Get a Marketing Form by ID.

name: launch_new_marketing_initiative
description: Creates a new campaign.

initiative_start_year.description: The start year of the campaign.

initiative_start_month.description: The start month of the campaign.

initiative_start_day.description: The start day of the campaign.

initiative_end_year.description: The end year of the campaign.

initiative_end_month.description: The end month of the campaign.

initiative_end_day.description: The end day of the campaign.

campaign_organisational_color_tag.description: The color label of the campaign.

name: list_all_design_templates
description: Get all templates. Supports paging and filtering.

max_results_per_page.description: The maximum number of templates to return. Default is 20.

starting_page_offset.description: The offset of the first template to return. Default is 0.

filter_by_deletion_timestamp.description: Filter by deletion timestamp in milliseconds since epoch.

filter_by_content_availability.description: Filter by availability for new content.

name: list_all_marketing_events
description: Get all marketing events.

event_start_date_filter.description: Filter events that occurred after this timestamp.

event_end_date_filter.description: Filter events that occurred before this timestamp.

maximum_events_to_return.description: Maximum number of events to return.

name: list_event_attendees
description: Get attendees of a marketing event.

source_event_external_id.description: The unique identifier for the marketing event as per the external system where the event was created.

max_attendees_to_fetch.description: The maximum number of attendees to return. Default to 10. The Maximum is 100.

name: list_global_form_subscription_definitions
description: Get all global form event subscription definitions.

name: mark_template_as_deleted
description: Marks the selected Template as deleted. The Template can be restored later via a POST to the restore-deleted endpoint.

specified_deletion_timestamp.description:
Timestamp in milliseconds since epoch of when the template was deleted.
If not provided, current timestamp will be used.

name: modify_promotional_email_content
description: Updates an existing marketing email.

email_identifier_to_update.description: The unique ID of the marketing email to update (required).

new_internal_email_name.description: The internal name of the email.

new_email_html_body.description: The HTML body of the email.

new_transactional_status.description: Whether this is a transactional email.

new_customer_reward_points.description: Number of reward points for loyalty program emails.

new_exclusive_access_code.description: Access code for VIP or exclusive offers.

name: modify_registered_marketing_event
description: Update a marketing event.

target_external_event_identifier.description: The unique identifier for the marketing event as per the external system where the event was created.

target_external_account_identifier.description: The unique identifier for the account where the event was created.

updated_event_name.description: The name of the marketing event.

updated_event_type.description: The type of the marketing event.

new_start_datetime.description: The start date and time of the marketing event.

new_end_datetime.description: The end date and time of the marketing event.

new_event_organizer_name.description: The organizer of the marketing event.

updated_event_description.description: A description of the marketing event.

new_event_web_url.description: A URL for more information about the marketing event.

selectedByUser.description: Whether the property was selected by the user.

updatedByUserId.description: ID of the user who last updated the property.

sourceMetadata.description: Source metadata encoded as a base64 string.

useTimestampAsPersistenceTimestamp.description: Whether to use timestamp as persistence timestamp.

updated_custom_properties.description:
Custom properties associated with the marketing event.
Each property is a dictionary with the following structure:

name: modify_template_by_identifier
description: Updates a template. If not all the fields are included in the body, we will only update the included fields.

new_template_category_id.description: Category type (0: Unmapped, 1: Landing Pages, 2: Email, 3: Blog Post, 4: Site Page).

new_template_folder.description: The folder where the template is saved.

new_design_template_type.description: Type of template (2: Email, 4: Page, 11: Error, etc.).

updated_template_source_code.description: The source code of the template.

revised_template_file_path.description: The path where the template is saved.

updated_creation_time.description: Creation timestamp in milliseconds since epoch.

new_deletion_timestamp.description: Deletion timestamp in milliseconds since epoch.

updated_content_availability_status.description: Whether the template is available for new content.

source.description: The source code of this version.

new_template_version_list.description:
List of template versions.
Each version should have:

name: recover_archived_template
description: Restores a previously deleted Template.

name: register_external_marketing_event
description: Create a marketing event.

source_system_event_id.description: The unique identifier for the marketing event as per the external system where the event was created.

source_system_account_id.description: The unique identifier for the account(external system) where the event was created.

new_event_title.description: The name of the marketing event.

new_event_category.description: The type of the marketing event.

event_host_name.description: The organizer of the marketing event.

event_commencement_datetime.description: The start date and time of the marketing event.

event_conclusion_datetime.description: The end date and time of the marketing event.

detailed_event_summary.description: A description of the marketing event.

event_landing_page_url.description: A URL for more information about the marketing event.

selectedByUser.description: Whether the property was selected by the user.

updatedByUserId.description: ID of the user who last updated the property.

sourceMetadata.description: Source metadata encoded as a base64 string.

useTimestampAsPersistenceTimestamp.description: Whether to use timestamp as persistence timestamp.

additional_event_metadata.description:
Custom properties associated with the marketing event.
Each property is a dictionary with the following structure:

name: remove_attendee_from_event
description: Remove an attendee from a marketing event.

event_id_for_attendee_removal.description: The unique identifier for the marketing event as per the external system where the event was created.

attendee_id_to_remove.description: The unique identifier for the attendee.

account_id_for_attendee_removal.description: The unique identifier for the account where the event was created.

name: remove_external_marketing_event
description: Delete a marketing event.

event_id_from_external_system.description: The unique identifier for the marketing event as per the external system where the event was created.

account_id_from_external_system.description: The unique identifier for the account where the event was created.

name: remove_global_form_event_webhook
description: Deletes (unsubscribes) a webhook subscription.

webhook_subscription_id_to_delete.description: The id of the subscription definition.

name: retrieve_global_form_event_webhooks
description: Gets all webhook subscriptions for global form events.

name: retrieve_marketing_forms
description: Get all Marketing Forms.

pagination_start_cursor.description: The id of the form to start after.

form_retrieval_limit.description: The maximum number of forms to return.

filter_by_form_creation_date.description: The date the form was created.

filter_created_after_this_date.description: The date the form was created after.

filter_created_from_this_date.description: The date the form was created after or equal to.

filter_created_before_this_date.description: The date the form was created before.

filter_created_until_this_date.description: The date the form was created before or equal to.

filter_by_form_update_date.description: The date the form was updated.

filter_updated_after_this_date.description: The date the form was updated after.

filter_updated_from_this_date.description: The date the form was updated after or equal to.

filter_updated_before_this_date.description: The date the form was updated before.

filter_updated_until_this_date.description: The date the form was updated before or equal to.

name: retrieve_promotional_email_by_id
description: Retrieves a marketing email by its ID.

marketing_email_unique_id.description: The unique ID of the marketing email (required).

name: revise_marketing_initiative
description: Updates a campaign.

new_initiative_start_year.description: The start year of the campaign.

new_initiative_start_month.description: The start month of the campaign.

new_initiative_start_day.description: The start day of the campaign.

new_initiative_end_year.description: The end year of the campaign.

new_initiative_end_month.description: The end month of the campaign.

new_initiative_end_day.description: The end day of the campaign.

new_campaign_color_tag.description: The color label of the campaign.

name: search_for_marketing_campaigns
description: Returns a list of marketing campaigns (Basic implementation).

query_result_limit.description: The maximum number of campaigns to return.

query_result_offset.description: The number of campaigns to skip.

filter_created_after_timestamp.description: Filter campaigns by creation date greater than a specific date.

filter_created_from_timestamp.description: Filter campaigns by creation date greater than or equal to a specific date.

filter_created_before_timestamp.description: Filter campaigns by creation date less than a specific date.

filter_created_until_timestamp.description: Filter campaigns by creation date less than or equal to a specific date.

filter_updated_after_timestamp.description: Filter campaigns by update date greater than a specific date.

filter_updated_from_timestamp.description: Filter campaigns by update date greater than or equal to a specific date.

filter_updated_before_timestamp.description: Filter campaigns by update date less than a specific date.

filter_updated_until_timestamp.description: Filter campaigns by update date less than or equal to a specific date.

filter_name_with_substring.description: Filter campaigns by name containing a specific string.

filter_name_with_case_insensitive_substr.description: Filter campaigns by name containing a specific string (case insensitive).

filter_name_not_matching.description: Filter campaigns by name not equal to a specific string.

filter_id_not_matching.description: Filter campaigns by id not equal to a specific string.

filter_type_not_matching.description: Filter campaigns by type not equal to a specific string.

name: shelve_marketing_initiative
description: Archives a campaign. Archived campaigns aren't included in the results when listing campaigns.

name: toggle_global_form_event_webhook
description: Updates (specifically, activates or deactivates) a webhook subscription.

target_webhook_id.description: The id of the subscription definition.

new_webhook_activation_status.description: Whether the subscription definition is active.

name: upsert_event_attendee_record
description: Create or update an attendee for a marketing event.

associated_event_external_id.description: The unique identifier for the marketing event as per the external system where the event was created.

associated_account_external_id.description: The unique identifier for the account where the event was created.

attendee_email_address.description: The email address of the attendee.

attendee_join_timestamp.description: The date and time when the attendee joined the event.

attendee_departure_timestamp.description: The date and time when the attendee left the event.

name: void_marketing_event
description: Marks an event as cancelled.

event_identifier_to_cancel.description: The unique identifier for the marketing event as per the external system where the event was created.

account_identifier_for_cancellation.description: The unique identifier for the account where the event was created.
